data.name: IH0001Description
data.value: Classes annotated with a Handler attribute should implement a HandleAsync method that takes in a command/query and a cancellationtoken

data.name: IH0001MessageFormat
data.value: Type name '{0}' should implement a HandleAsync method.

data.name: IH0001Title
data.value: Type name should implement a HandleAsync method

data.name: IH0002Description
data.value: HandleAsync method must return a Task<T>

data.name: IH0003Description
data.value: HandleAsync method must must take the request type as it's first parameter and a CancellationToken as it's last parameter.

data.name: IH0003MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' must take the request type as it's first parameter and a CancellationToken as it's last parameter.
